creditline: Gift of John R. Van Derlip, E. C. Gale and others
description: Bowl with vertical sides and small foot; coarse pottery covered with thick dark brown glaze except on foot and on seal; Rakku Pottery. Rakku Seals on sides and bottom.
markings: Raku seals on sides and bottom.
medium: Raku ware; glazed stoneware with incised designs
title: Tea bowl with cherry blossoms
